perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, AVDU desires to engage UTK to provide the services as set forth in this Agreement, and

WHEREAS, UTK is agreeable to provide these services.
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, AVDU desires to engage UTK to provide the services as set forth in this Agreement, and

WHEREAS, UTK is obligated to provide these services.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that UTK is 'agreeable' to provide services, implying a voluntary commitment. The modified text states that UTK is 'obligated' to provide the services, suggesting a mandatory requirement. This introduces a conflict as to the nature of UTK's commitment and level of effort required and thus adds uncertainty to enforcement.

perturbation.original_text:
UTK shall devote such time and efforts, as it deems commercially reasonable, under the circumstances to the affairs of the AVDU, as is reasonable and adequate to render the Services contemplated by this Agreement.

  B. UTK cannot guarantee results on behalf of AVDU, but shall pursue all reasonable avenues available through its network of contacts. The acceptance and consumption of any transaction is subject to acceptance of the terms and conditions by its sole discretion.
perturbation.changed_text:
UTK shall devote minimal time and effort, as it deems fit, under the circumstances to the affairs of the AVDU. 

  B. UTK shall deliver guaranteed results on behalf of AVDU.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that UTK will devote time and efforts as it deems 'commercially reasonable' and 'cannot guarantee results.' The modified text states that UTK will devote 'minimal time and effort' as it deems fit, and 'shall deliver guaranteed results'. This creates a contradiction: how can UTK guarantee results with minimal effort?

perturbation.original_text: UTK shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless AVDU from and against any and all losses incurred by AVDU which arise out of or result from misrepresentation, breach of warranty or breach or non- fulfillment of any covenant contained herein or Schedules annexed hereto or in any other documents or instruments furnished by UTK pursuant hereto or in connection with this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: UTK is not obligated to indemnify, defend and hold harmless AVDU from and against any and all losses incurred by AVDU which arise out of or result from misrepresentation, breach of warranty or breach or non- fulfillment of any covenant contained herein or Schedules annexed hereto or in any other documents or instruments furnished by UTK pursuant hereto or in connection with this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that UTK 'shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless AVDU.' The modified text states that UTK is 'not obligated to indemnify, defend and hold harmless AVDU'. This creates a contradiction relating to the Indemnification obligations of UTK.
perturbation.location: IX. OTHER MATERIAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS - A. INDEMNITY. 1.
